product_name: Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Padded Soft Cell Case - Large
long_description: Designed for delicate gadgets that need a little protection in your pack, the Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Padded Soft Cell Case in the large size offers light padding for your phone or compact camera. High-density, die-cut EVA foam encased in tough water-resistant fabric provides cushioning in a robust and light weight packing cell. EVA foam offers low-temperature toughness and water resistance. Hypalon grab tabs and large grab handles for ease of use. U-shaped zipper creates a flip lid that stays open while loading. The large Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Padded Soft Cell Case measures 7.25 x 4.75 x 3.5 in. and weighs approximately 2.2 oz.
short_description: Designed for delicate gadgets that need a little protection in your pack, the Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Padded Soft Cell Case in the large size offers light padding for your phone or compact camera.
